25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Qatadah through a different chain of narrators to the effect that two men laid claim camel and both of them produced witness so the prophet (peace be upon him) divided it in halves between them

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلَيْنِ يَدَّعِيَانِ شَيْئًا وَلَيْسَتْ لَهُمَا بَيِّنَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: Two men who claim something but have no proof
